item.title: My dad recommends some music
item.description: I sat down with my dad for an hour to ask for music recommendations. …and the entire soundtrack of Papa, Can You Hear Me Sing. …the Godfather of Mandopop. …and anything written by 李宗盛. …and anything written by 梁弘志 (TODO: write an English Wikipedia entry).

item.title: Album: 新裤子 New Pants - Go East
item.description: Go East “Go East” was released in 2009, a year after Beijing hosted the 2008 Summer Olympics. The title is a reference to the song “Go West” (sidenote: featured in my favorite movie Mountains May Depart). The dialogue throughout the song is sampled from the film 《不是为了爱情》 (Not for Love). For research purposes, I decided to watch the clip the song sampled from. “但是我不能为这离开我的祖国！” I can’t leave my motherland for this!

item.title: Playlist: week of 10-21-2022
item.description: Bringing back 2000s-era blogging, where I talk about anything and everything that interests me on my blog. I am particularly interested in music none of my friends listen to. As a result, I talk about it on my blog, into the void! Don’t Break My Heart One of my favorite TV/film cliches is small town to big city. This song plays in the background when the main character in Lou Ye’s Summer Palace leaves for Beijing.

item.title: Every match I watched in person at the US Open (2021-2022)
item.description: 2021 Fall break in NYC! Went back to Ithaca, then drove back down again for the final. Carlos Alcaraz vs Stefanos Tsitsipas | 2021 US Open Round 3 Leylah Fernandez vs Naomi Osaka | 2021 US Open Round 3 Mixed Doubles Final | Krawczyk/Salisbury vs Olmos/Arevalo | 2021 US Open Emma Raducanu vs Leylah Fernandez Highlights | 2021 US Open Final 2022 No more driving 5 hours upstate! Hradecka/Noskova vs. Williams/Williams | 2022 US Open Round 1 Fabio Fognini vs.

item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I’m Joy. I live in New York City. I grew up in the western suburbs of Chicago and have also spent extended time in Ithaca and Beijing.
